brief_summary.textblock:
100mg clomiphene citrate used for ovulation induction. The investigators take blood sample
      at 3 and 10 days of menstruation and count AMH and inhibin B.

clinical_study.brief_title: Does Clomiphene Citrate Used for Induction of Ovulation Effect Levels of AMH and Inhibin B

detailed_description.textblock:
100mg clomiphene citrate used for ovulation induction. The investigators take blood sample
      at 3 and 10 days of menstruation. AMH and inhibit B level will be measured in serum. We want
      to search relation of AMH, inhibin b and ovulation induction.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Infertility treatment

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Previous ovarian surgery

          -  Single functioning ovary

clinical_study.official_title: Does Clomiphene Citrate Used for Induction of Ovulation Effect Levels of AMH and Inhibin B

overall_official.affiliation: Bagcilar Training and Research Hospital, Istanbul, Turkey.

primary_outcome.measure: Does Clomiphene Citrate Used for Induction of Ovulation Effect Levels of AMH level

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Case-Only, Time Perspective: Prospective
